title: Ebro In The Morning - Stephen A. Smith Interview
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez host HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this interview aired on 8/24. Stephen A. Smith discusses broadcasting, having to apologize for controversial statements, and Knicks basketball.
